left pad material numbers

Source: R/sap_ext.R
pa_matn1_input.Rd

Pads material numbers with leading zeros to match the standard 18-character SAP material number format.

Usage

pa_matn1_input(x, .width = 18)

Arguments

x

A character vector of material numbers.

.width

The desired width of the material number. Default is 18. Only numeric-like strings will be padded.

Value

A character vector where numeric strings are left-padded with zeros to a width of 18. Non-numeric strings remain unchanged.

Details

This function mimics the behavior of SAP's CONVERSION_EXIT_MATN1_INPUT, which ensures material numbers are standardized to 18 characters by adding leading zeros.

Examples

pa_matn1_input(c("123", "456789", "A123"))
#> [1] "000000000000000123" "000000000000456789" "A123"              
# Returns: c("000000000000000123", "000000000000456789", "A123")
